title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 821/97 of 6 May 1997 on additional quantities of textile products to be made available to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 821/97 of 6 May 1997 on additional quantities of textile products to be made available to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following quantities shall be made available to allow the release into free circulation of products for which Vietnam has issued 1996 export licences:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
